D3 - Nest, Date grouping

Created:2018-09-26  Last modified:2018-09-26

  • Introduction
  • References

  1. Introduction

    Addressed Problem:

    1. A table need to be grouped and/or aggregate in one variable.

        // weather data
    [
        {"city":"Atlanta", "temperature":33},
        {"city":"Atlanta", "temperature":30},
        {"city":"Minneapolis", "temperature":16},
        {"city":"Minneapolis", "temperature":15}
    ]
    // =>
    [
        {
            "key":"Atlanta",
            "values":[
                {"city":"Atlanta", "temperature":33},
                {"city":"Atlanta", "temperature":30}
            ]
        },
        {
            "key":"Minneapolis",
            "values":[
                {"city":"Minneapolis", "temperature":16},
                {"city":"Minneapolis", "temperature":15}
            ]
        }
    ]
    // or =>
    [
        {"city":"Atlanta", "temperature":31.5},
        {"city":"Minneapolis", "temperature":15.5}
    ]
